segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's going to fall if he's not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the stool wobbling beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just watching, waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's smarter than her brother, staying on the ground.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm she is with all this happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the sink, and she doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the dishes are even clean with all that water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice and dry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would do something before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
